typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		inainaid as string,
		inaagaid as string,
		inaobno as integer,
		inaintrst as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select inainaid, inaagaid, inaobno, inaintrst from dwh_stage.p_inatable',
	format: 'query') ~> inatable
source(output(
		inninnid as string,
		inninaid as string,
		inncncode as string,
		innstdate as date,
		inntodate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select inninnid, inninaid, inncncode, innstdate, inntodate from dwh_stage.p_inntable',
	format: 'query') ~> inntable
source(output(
		obaimono as integer,
		obaobno as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select obaimono, obaobno from dwh_stage.p_obatable',
	format: 'query') ~> obatable
source(output(
		source_code_key as string,
		target_code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select source_code_key, target_code from dwh_stage.t_crossreference \nwhere source_system=\'PARIS\'\nand code_type_id=122',
	format: 'query') ~> xrefCoverage
source(output(
		agaagaid as string,
		agaorgins as long,
		agabusnbranch as integer,
		agabusnregion as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select agaagaid, agaorgins, agabusnbranch, agabusnregion from dwh_stage.p_agatable',
	format: 'query') ~> agatable
inntable, inatable join(inninaid == inainaid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innina
innina, CapitalBranchKey join(inaagaid == agaagaid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> inaaga
inaaga, obatable join(inaobno == obaobno,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> inaobno
inaobno, xrefCoverage join(inaintrst == source_code_key,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> inacoverage
inacoverage derive(dim_coverage_key = coalesce(target_code, 'N/A'),
		dim_client_key = concat('P', toString(agaorgins)),
		dim_object_key = case(coalesce(toString(obaimono),toString(0))!=toString(0), concat('I', toString(obaimono)), concat('P', toString(obaimono))),
		last_updated_by = 'm_pre_fact_trading_certi_pa',
		dim_capital_branch_key = coalesce(capbranchkey,'N/A')) ~> Expression
agatable derive(capbranchkey = concat(toString(agabusnbranch), ' - ',toString(agabusnregion))) ~> CapitalBranchKey
Expression sink(input(
		pk_trading_certificate as string,
		section as decimal(28,10),
		trading_certificate_type as string,
		dim_client_key as string,
		date_valid_to as date,
		object_key as string,
		dim_coverage_key as string,
		dm_number as decimal(28,10),
		date_valid_from as date,
		date_inserted as timestamp,
		last_updated_by as string,
		inserted_by as string,
		date_last_updated as timestamp,
		dim_capital_branch_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		pk_trading_certificate = inninnid,
		trading_certificate_type = inncncode,
		dim_client_key,
		date_valid_to = inntodate,
		object_key = dim_object_key,
		dim_coverage_key,
		date_valid_from = innstdate,
		last_updated_by,
		dim_capital_branch_key
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> prefacttradingcertificate
